description:
All-round versatility – High Coast Lite Jacket offers lightweight wind protection for hiking, travelling and everyday missions in warm conditions. Made from a pliant, quick-drying polyester fabric (partly
recycled) with a simple, no-fuss design that keeps weight to a minimum. The hood can be stowed into the collar – to avoid it getting caught in branches, for example – and the whole jacket can be packed into one of its pockets.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Lite Jacket - Mens
